name: dumbjson
description: Dumb json lets you be dumb with json. Ignore comment data for readability. That's it. Pretty dumb.

scripts.typescript: node_modules/.bin/tsc src/index.ts --noImplicitAny --lib ES2017 -t ES2016 --moduleResolution Node --outFile index.js
scripts.tsc: node_modules/.bin/tsc src/index.ts --noImplicitAny --lib ES2017 -t ES2016 --moduleResolution Node --outFile index.js

author: mickwilliams
